comments:
20030825

If you select an entry, close the dialog and then reopen it selecting anotehr 
entry will result in a "this page has invalid values" although you selected 
nothing.

The dialog font was being applied to buttons even after they were disposed.

STEPS
1) Open the preferences dialog
2) Select the file associations page
3) Error will occur as the font is being applied to the button ar which has 
just been disposed.

Fixed in build >20030825

Here is the stack trace
